Reviews.Title: “GREAT SERVICE”
Reviews.Author: Alan1961_12
Reviews.Content: have been coming here for 12 years.the manager is very helpful and the rooms are very clean.linens and towels are new . location is very good and many bars/restaurants in walking distance. will continue to stay here as we are always made to feel welcome.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: Connie J
Reviews.Content: It was a clean and friendly environment. Jose the Concierge was very helpful with what my friends and I needed. Helped with Finding our way around . When staff are friendly, it makes the stay more welcoming. Would stay there again...maybe next year.

Reviews.Title: “Great budget find.”
Reviews.Author: saturdayboy
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for three nights in a 2 bedroom cottage. We were looking for somewhere to stay at a budget price and this place was mentioned when I submitted a question on here loo king for budget motel in LA. The lady who owns the motel showed us round when we arrived and explained parking arrangements because parking is very tight, but not a problem. but free which is a bonus in LA. Rooms were clean with fridge and microwave. The rooms are not ultra modern but at the price you pay this place is a real bargain. Complimentary breakfast in the morning bagels/fruit and cereal. Nice Mexican/sports bar up the street and Ralphs supermarket in opposite direction. Well placed for exploring LA...Recommended

Reviews.Title: “Don't stay here!”
Reviews.Author: mrsarizona
Reviews.Content: Never again will I stay at this motel. I needed to be in LA to take care of some emergency business and last minute decided to stay at this motel (Wilshire Motel). There was a big nasty stain on the bed sheets! Trash frm the precious guest on the floor. The door locks didn't work well, the room smelled horriable. All I was trying to do was save a few bucks and it turned out horriable! The motel costed me $80 bucks I shld have just paid $20 bucks more and stayed at a moderate hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Happy mistake”
Reviews.Author: B1gDan77
Reviews.Content: Close to the beach, the lack of phone lended to the vacation ambience. And, although there is no continental breakfast, there are coffee makers, microwaves, and fridges in each room. The lady in charge is super sweet and made us feel very comfortable and at home. Great weekend stay!

Reviews.Title: “I'll Be Back!”
Reviews.Author: k9taos
Reviews.Content: Low prices, great Location, quiet rooms, small refrigerator, coffee maker, microwave in each room. This is not your cookie cutter chain motel. There are no phones in the rooms, no ice machine, and no alarm clocks. However it is very clean and well taken care of and has excellent internet service. Every other review of this motel is accurate. The area is peppered with reasonably priced restaurants, dry cleaners, a supermarket, and even a "Belgian Chocolate Shoppe" right across the street. I am thrilled that I decided to give this little inn a try.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: RaoulCarlos
Reviews.Content: I come back to this Motel every year. It is Ã  very nice Motel in an excellent location. The Motel manager is very friendly and she always offers the best of service. If you have Ã  question or Ã  problem she will always help. I would recoment everybody to stay in this Motel.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location - fairly priced”
Reviews.Author: ehudf
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in the Wilshire Motel a dozen of times. Excellent place to stay for people coming from far away and having business in the area: A walking distance from the bus stop of the bus from LAX, Ralph's, fast food outlets, restaurants, cafes, and several department stores. Reasonable prices and kind owners. A visitor from Israel

Reviews.Title: “Great location on Western end of Wilshire”
Reviews.Author: ESCC
Reviews.Content: I was asked to find accommodations for a family member who needed a convenient place to stay for two weeks while on a business trip to the Wilshire District. I was pleased to find the Wilshire Motel because it was within a couple of blocks of the office building where he needed to be each day. Parking is at a premium in that area, but since the motel (which provided free parking) was within easy walking distance of the office building, the parking problem was solved. There are several places to eat in the area within easy walking distance. A supermarket is even nearby to pick up snacks. Prices range from $75 to $105 (single rooms, cottages with 1 or 2 bedrooms, some rooms with microwave and refrigerator, some cottages with kitchenette). To find accommodations in that area on Wilshire Boulevard at those prices is extraordinary. The room was comfortable and well kept. Free Internet (WiFi) is provided. The owners are quite gracious and accommodating. This is not a luxury hotel, but a place where one would stay again--which is always the true test of value received.

Reviews.Title: “Basic 1950s motor court in great location”
Reviews.Author: Craxiter
Reviews.Content: With short notice I needed a place to stay near UCLA and based on other reviews tried the Wilshire Motel, which is very easy to get to from UCLA on the #2 Blue Bus. I had passed it many times in the past and been curious. It is a set of small cabins set in from Wilshire Blvd. I got a back cabin which was clean, small, basic, but at a basic price. AC with compressor on very noisy, but on "Low Cool" fairly quiet. From other reviews there are some real dives in the Santa Monica area, this is a big step up. Not for those who like fancy hotels though, but the location can't be beat.

HotelInfo.Name: Wilshire Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 12023 Wilshire Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90025
